data.description: Helps Perl module management via SD-UX
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The module is only functional on HP-UX, so it should live in there.

    RPM::* exists, but RPM for HP-UX 11i appears to be hard to find (if
    not non-existent), and some may prefer managing Perl modules with
    vendor-supplied software management system.
